author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ANDREA EXPECTED TO BECOME A POST-TROPICAL REMNANT LOW LATER TONIGHT...
summary: ...ANDREA EXPECTED TO BECOME A POST-TROPICAL REMNANT LOW LATER TONIGHT... As of 5:00 PM AST Tue Jun 24 the center of Andrea was located near 37.9, -47.4 with movement NE at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1015 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ANDREA EXPECTED TO BECOME A POST-TROPICAL REMNANT LOW LATER TONIGHT... As of 5:00 PM AST Tue Jun 24 the center of Andrea was located near 37.9, -47.4 with movement NE at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1015 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Andrea (AT1/AL012025)
